p: Prior to finalizing the research question, we solicited input from an expert advisory team from Canada and South America consisting of four government and two academic scientists with expertise on the topic. Our topic experts consented to help us frame the scope of this study by answering a questionnaire in writing; S1 Expert Questionnaire. All but one expert also participated in a teleconference call aimed to discuss key issues and information needs required for public health professionals to assess and address this emerging issue. Subsequent discussions were held with the experts whenever clarification was needed. The finalized protocol was shared with our topic experts before commencing our review.
